metadata.name: Samurai Shonen
metadata.description:
Samurai Shonen (侍少年) is a play-to-earn (P2E) massively multiplayer online (MMO) game in development by tri-Ace, Inc. tri-Ace is a Japanese video game development company prominently known for its Star Ocean & Valkyrie Profile series. 

This is the genesis collection of Samurai Shonen which comprises of 1111 distinctive characters.
